2.text: Rinse the baby potatoes under cool water.

3.text: Scrub the potatoes with a vegetable brush to remove excess dirt.

4.text: Cut the potatoes in half to speed up cooking time if desired.

5.text: Place the baby potatoes on a greased baking sheet or jelly roll pan.

6.text: Mix the seasoning ingredients together in a small bowl.

7.text: Pour the oil mixture over the potatoes.

8.text: Toss the baby potatoes in the roasting pan or baking dish.

9.text: Spread the potatoes in a single layer 1⁄2 in (1.3 cm) apart.

10.text: Roast the potatoes uncovered for 20-35 minutes.

11.text: Check the potatoes after 20 minutes for a brown color and tenderness.

12.text: Cook the potatoes another 5-10 minutes if they’re not done.

13.text: Transfer the potatoes to a serving platter when they are done cooking.
